text: Strážske (; ) is a town in Michalovce District in the Košice Region in Slovakia. It is on the river Laborec. About 4,000 people live there. == History == Strážske was first mentioned in 1337. == Twin towns == Strážske is twinned with: * Nieporęt, Poland * Drahanská vrchovina, Czech Republic * Dolna Banya, Bulgaria == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Košice Region
title: Strážske
